instruction: Compose a brief description of a product.
output: The Apple iPhone 12 is the ultimate smartphone experience. It combines stylish design, long-lasting battery life, a stunning Super Retina display, powerful Apple A14 Bionic chip, and revolutionary Dual-Camera system to capture photos and videos like never before. With 5G and powerful AI capabilities, the iPhone 12 delivers remarkable speed and intelligence to power everyday tasks and activities. Plus, advanced water resistance and innovative MagSafe accessories make the iPhone 12 perfect for any lifestyle.
